verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3060"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehu began \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* Jerusalem: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3060"\w* mother’s name \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Zibiah \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beer-sheba.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w did|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* which \w was|strong="H8034"\w* right \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* all \w his|strong="H3060"\w* \w days|strong="H8141"\w* wherein Jehoiada \w the|strong="H3058"\w* priest instructed \w him|strong="H4427"\w*.

Howbeit \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H6213"\w* \w places|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w taken|strong="H6213"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5869"\w* still \w sacrificed|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6213"\w* incense \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H6213"\w* \w places|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* Jehoash said \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*, \w All|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* hallowed \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H5493"\w* \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* house \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5493"\w* current money, \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* persons \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w each|strong="H5971"\w* man \w is|strong="H5971"\w* rated, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* cometh \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* man’s heart \w to|strong="H5971"\w* bring \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* house \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* acquaintance; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* repair \w the|strong="H3605"\w* breaches \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, wheresoever \w any|strong="H3605"\w* breach \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* three \w and|strong="H1004"\w* twentieth year \w of|strong="H1004"\w* king Jehoash \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3947"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* breaches \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* called \w for|strong="H1004"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \add other\add* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H6242"\w* said \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Why|strong="H3808"\w* \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* breaches \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \add more\add* money \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* acquaintance, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* deliver \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* breaches \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* consented \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w no|strong="H3947"\w* \add more\add* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people, neither \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* breaches \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* chest, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* bored \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hole \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* lid \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* set \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w beside|strong="H1115"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* altar, \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* right side \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w one|strong="H1004"\w* cometh \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* kept \w the|strong="H3947"\w* threshold \w put|strong="H3947"\w* therein \w all|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w*, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* saw \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w much|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chest, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king’s scribe \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* bags \w and|strong="H3068"\w* counted \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* weighed \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* work, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* oversight \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* paid \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* carpenters \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* builders, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrought|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w masons|strong="H2796"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hewers \w of|strong="H1004"\w* stone, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* buying \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hewn stone \w to|strong="H3318"\w* repair \w the|strong="H5921"\w* breaches \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* repair \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* cups \w of|strong="H1004"\w* silver, snuffers, basins, trumpets, \w any|strong="H3605"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H1004"\w* gold, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H1004"\w* silver, \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* money \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*;

\w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* repaired therewith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* reckoned \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w*, \w into|strong="H6213"\w* whose \w hand|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* money \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* faithfully.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* trespass-offerings, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin-offerings, \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*’.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Hazael king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Syria \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fought \w against|strong="H3068"\w* Gath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Hazael set \w his|strong="H3068"\w* face \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Jerusalem.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Jehoash \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hallowed things \w that|strong="H4428"\w* Jehoshaphat \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Jehoram \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaziah, \w his|strong="H7760"\w* fathers, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah, \w had|strong="H4428"\w* dedicated, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* hallowed things, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gold \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* found \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* treasures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s house, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Syria: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* acts \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3060"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* book \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chronicles \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* servants arose, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* conspiracy, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* smote \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Millo, \add on the way\add* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3117"\w* \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Silla.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* Jozacar \w the|strong="H5221"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Shimeath, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Jehozabad \w the|strong="H5221"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Shomer, \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* died; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* buried \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fathers \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* city \w of|strong="H1004"\w* David: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Amaziah \w his|strong="H5221"\w* son reigned \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* stead.
